title: Wi-Fi Issues in Section 101
feedback_text: Wi-Fi was spotty during the game on 2025-05-01. Could barely use the app to order food.

title: Scoreboard Glitch
feedback_text: The scoreboard froze during the third quarter. It was confusing for fans.

title: Ticketing App Crash
feedback_text: The ticketing app crashed when I tried to buy tickets for the next game. Very frustrating!

title: POS System Failure at Concessions
feedback_text: The POS system at the main concessions stand crashed during halftime on 2025-05-03, causing long lines and cash-only chaos. Needs immediate fix before next game!

title: General Comment on Arena Atmosphere
feedback_text: The atmosphere at the game on 2025-05-03 was electric! Loved the music and lighting.
